title: Yascha Mounk on Populism and Democracy
itunes:title: Yascha Mounk on Populism and Democracy
itunes:subtitle: Episode 290
description:
Benjamin Wittes speaks to Yascha Mounk about his new book: 'The People vs. Democracy: Why Our Freedom Is in Danger and How to Save It."
